ygData.subject: Re: You crazy kids!
ygData.msgSnippet: I post a lot because (a) I have to work and (b) they re silly enough to give me a computer at work. Does anyone roll play? I don t do as much with my
ygData.messageBody:
I post a lot because (a) I have to work and (b)
they're silly enough to give me a computer at
work.<br><br>Does anyone roll play? I don't do as much with my
main-- i've found that at higher levels, people get too
serious for roll playing--it's all raid/camp strategy
with some goofiness thrown in for good measure.
<br><br>I have a lvl 9 DE chanter, who made it to Gfay. I
laugh and laugh as the guards ignore my wood elf
illusion. I even cast Alliance on the merchants and "steal"
their money by getting great prices for my rusty junk.
I rarely help anyone in need, unless it is to my
own benefit, and I'll often slip out of illusion and
scare weaking, love filled wood elves. The cannot
understand the power of Hate, and the strength of the
Tier'Dal. <br><br>Often I'll here shouts of "ACK!! there's
an inkie by the bank!!!" Foolish tree-huggers!!
Though I have killed many orcs (they are just stupid
pawns, that will one day be nothing more that our pets),
my favorite past-time is taking down the helpless
slaves in Crushbone. How sad-- I approach them as a wood
elf and hold the key to their salvation in front of
their faces--then I revert to my natural, beautifully
evil form and let them gaze upon their doom befor
dispatching them quickly. My people back in Neriak will
forgive my indiscretions with our Orc "allys" after a few
more of my games with the helpless chain gang.
<br><br>Life is good in the Faydark. I wish that our forces
would move quicker into this area, but such is
politics. Mayong Mistmore is too caught up in his studies
of the undead (sigh-- necromancy is NOT the only
magic!!!), and to be honest, I think he's too afraid of
brownies to venture any farther than his pathetic little
castle. And don't get me started on that D'Vinn. He
kisses so much orc butt, that his nose is blue!! uh...
blue-ER!! With him as the envoy in CB, my people will never
know the pleasures i've enjoyed over the past weeks.
Admittedly, I have not trained enough in my magics to wreak
havok in that snooty city of Felwithe, but those
"high"elves have began to stew my hate and stoke my rage.
Still I must laugh. Even the self-described "high ones"
offer my the best prices and go so far as to offer me
training in their magic guilds!! Idiots!! When I obtain a
high enough rank, they will even train me on how to
take on the form of their own!!!! Fools!!!<br><br>So
if you see an odd looking wood elf with an animated
pet running through the Faydark and laughing
maniacally, best to step aside and let me pass!!
<br><br>Mandir the Terrible<br>Wood Elf Enchanter of the 10th
Illusion<br>Xev
